trans-unit.source: Contains style characteristics for menus on <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class is essentially a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> object, which contains style characteristics to apply to menus on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.

The Web Parts control set uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object to determine the style characteristics of the verbs menu on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

A verbs menu is contained in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and it includes various user interface (UI) actions (called verbs) that users can perform, such as closing, minimizing, exporting, or deleting a control.

You can set style attributes on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object, and thus on the verbs menu of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class has two important properties.

The first is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A> property, which determines whether the content of the menu is aligned on the left, the center, or the right of the control or the alignment is not set.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property determines the color of the shadow for the menu on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, if the menu shadowing feature is enabled on the user's system.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class also has some critical methods.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed into the method, and applies them to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.MergeWith%2A> method similarly copies nonblank style elements from the style object passed to the method, but it does not overwrite existing style elements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.Reset%2A> method removes any defined style elements from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> object's state bag.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class also implements all the methods contained in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
In general, this enables the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> class to be applied to different types of menus.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> class using default style values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> class using style values from the specified state bag object.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> that stores style information.
Copies nonblank style elements to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> object, overwriting any existing style elements in the process.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method copies style information from the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, and if there are any existing style elements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> instance, it overwrites them.
One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information to copy.
Gets a value indicating what type of horizontal alignment to use for the content of a menu on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A> property overrides the base property to prevent the alignment from being set, and to add some attributes to the property.

The property gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.HorizontalAlign%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value, but does not provide any implementation for the setter, so you cannot set the alignment of the menu content by using this property.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> enumeration value that specifies what type of alignment to use.
The default value is obtained from the base <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle.HorizontalAlign"></xref> property value.
Copies nonblank style elements to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> instance, but does not overwrite existing style elements.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.MergeWith%2A> method is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.CopyFrom%2A> method in that it copies style elements from a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object, but it differs in that it does not overwrite any existing style elements in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle> instance.
One reason this method overrides its base method is to customize the process of assigning a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information to copy.
Removes any defined style elements from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> object's state bag.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.Reset%2A> method is very similar to the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> class.

After some custom handling for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property, this method simply calls the base method to remove any remaining style elements from the state bag.
Gets or sets a value that determines the shadow color for a menu on a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property takes effect only when users have the Microsoft Windows menu-shadowing feature enabled on their systems.
When menu shadowing is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle.ShadowColor%2A> property sets the color of the shadow that is created around the menu content.
If no color value is assigned to the property, no shadow will appear on menus, even if menu shadowing is enabled on the system.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that determines the shadow color.
The default value is <xref href="System.Drawing.Color.Empty"></xref>.
Returns a collection of custom attributes for this instance of a component.
Implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetAttributes"></xref> method.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref> containing the attributes for this object.
Returns the class name of this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetClassName"></xref> method.
A string that contains the class name of the object, or `null` if the class has no name.
Returns the name of this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetComponentName"></xref> method.
A string that contains the object name, or `null` if the object has no name.
Returns a type converter for this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> used for this object, or `null` if there is no <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref>.
Returns the default event for this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetDefaultEvent"></xref> method.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> that represents the default event for this object, or `null` if the object has no events.
Returns the default property for this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetDefaultProperty"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the default property for this object, or `null` if the object has no properties.
Returns an editor of the specified type for this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetEditor(System.Type)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the editor for this object.
An of type editorBaseType that serves as the editor for this object, or `null` if the editor cannot be found.
Returns the events for this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents"></xref> method overload.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the events for this object.
Returns the events for this instance of a component using the specified attribute array as a filter.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents(System.Attribute[])"></xref> method overload.
An array of type <xref href="System.Attribute"></xref> used as a filter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the filtered events for this object.
Returns the properties for this instance of a component.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties"></xref> method overload.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the properties for this object.
Returns the properties for this instance of a component using the attribute array as a filter.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties(System.Attribute[])"></xref> method overload.
An array of type <xref href="System.Attribute"></xref> used as a filter.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the filtered properties for this object.
Returns an object that contains the property described by the specified property descriptor.
This method implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetPropertyOwner(System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the property whose owner is to be found.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the owner of the specified property.
